name: Plugger the Paranormal Plumber
description: When I was a kid, I remember watching 'Weird Science' in 1985. It was hilarious, at least I thought it was at the time. There was a scene where the the annoying brother 'Chet' was turned into a turd. So I go to thinking, how could I make a paranormal game that was a tribute to 'Weird Science'? So I can up with 'Plugger the Paranormal Plumber'. If you have a haunted bathroom or there's something strange in your toilet bowl, who ya gonna call? - Plugger of course. I hope you enjoy. I wish I had more time to dedicate to the Jam, I'm back to work soon, it was fun while it lasted.
